QueryResult.text: SELECT PMPTF.PROJECT_ID, PMPTF.CALENDAR_TIME_KEY, PCF.OBS1_UNIT_ID, PCF.OBS2_UNIT_ID, PCF.OBS3_UNIT_ID, PCF.OBS4_UNIT_ID, PCF.OBS5_UNIT_ID, PMPTF.IS_APPROVED, PMPTF.GOAL_SCORE, PMPTF.PRIORITY, PMPTF.START_DATE, PMPTF.BASE_START_DATE, PMPTF.FINISH_DATE, PMPTF.BASE_FINISH_DATE, PMPTF.START_VARIANCE, PMPTF.FINISH_VARIANCE, PMPTF.BUDGET_HOURS, PMPTF.ACTUAL_HOURS, PMPTF.BASELINE_HOURS, PMPTF.ETC_HOURS, PMPTF.ALLOCATED_HOURS, PMPTF.COST_BASE_LABOR, PMPTF.COST_BASE_EQUIP, PMPTF.COST_BASE_EXPENSE, PMPTF.COST_BASE_MATL, PMPTF.COST_BASE_TOTAL, PMPTF.COST_ACT_LABOR, PMPTF.COST_ACT_EQUIP, PMPTF.COST_ACT_EXPENSE, PMPTF.COST_ACT_MATL, PMPTF.COST_ACT_TOTAL, PMPTF.COST_ETC_LABOR, PMPTF.COST_ETC_EQUIP, PMPTF.COST_ETC_EXPENSE, PMPTF.COST_ETC_MATL, PMPTF.COST_ETC_TOTAL, PMPTF.CURRENCY_CODE, PMPTF.PCT_PLAN_EXPANDED, PMPTF.PCT_COMPLETE, PMPTF.EARNED_VALUE, PMPTF.PLANNED_VALUE, PMPTF.SCHEDULE_VARIANCE, PMPTF.COST_VARIANCE, PMPTF.CPI_NUMBER, PMPTF.SPI_NUMBER, PMPTF.OPEN_TASKS, PMPTF.CLOSED_TASKS, PMPTF.OPEN_ISSUES, PMPTF.CLOSED_ISSUES, PMPTF.OPEN_RISKS, PMPTF.CLOSED_RISKS, PMPTF.NUMBER_OF_RESOURCES, PMPTF.ACTUAL_HOURS_THIS_PERIOD, PMPTF.BASELINE_HOURS_THIS_PERIOD, PMPTF.ETC_HOURS_THIS_PERIOD, PMPTF.TASKS_OPENED_THIS_PERIOD, PMPTF.TASKS_CLOSED_THIS_PERIOD, PMPTF.ISSUES_OPENED_THIS_PERIOD, PMPTF.ISSUES_CLOSED_THIS_PERIOD, PMPTF.RISKS_OPENED_THIS_PERIOD, PMPTF.RISKS_CLOSED_THIS_PERIOD, PMPTF.IS_OPP_ENABLED, PMPTF.IS_FM_ENABLED, PMPTF.IS_MGMT_ENABLED FROM NBI_PM_PT_FACTS PMPTF, NBI_PROJECT_CURRENT_FACTS PCF WHERE PMPTF.PROJECT_ID = PCF.PROJECT_ID
